Scottish Mail [Exclusive]: Tierney is set to remain a Celtic player after both #AFC and Napoli sensationally walked away from the negotiating table last night.


Scottish Mail [Exclusive]: Last night, both suitors finally balked at Celtic’s steadfast refusal to let the 22-year-old move on for less than £25m with sources at both clubs adamant the deal is dead in the water.

Scottish Mail [Exclusive]: Boss Unai Emery and his board at the Emirates worked on an improved offer only to perform a last minute U-turn on their pursuit of the player late yesterday.

Simon Collings [Standard Sport]: It is thought #AFC would consider allowing one of their promising young players, such as Reiss Nelson, to move to #CPFC on loan.
